scenario.description: The Scenario to which this InstanceCombination belongs to.

cloud_vendor_name.description: The cloud vendor name of the instances.

cloud_name.description: The cloud name of the instances.

datacenter_name.description: Where applicable, the datacenter name of the instances.

platform.description: The platform isn't the actual operating system of the instance as cloud vendors don't always have a way for us to access this.

monthly_usage_option.description: The number of hours that the instances run for every month.

monthly_usage_hours.description: If monthly_usage_option is set to 'Other', this specifies the hours in the month the instances are running.

patterns.description: Patterns applied to the InstanceCombination, in the order that they are applied.

reserved_instance_purchases.description: Reserved Instance purchases applied to the instance combination.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the InstanceCombination was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the InstanceCombination was last updated.

scenario.description: The Scenario to which this InstanceCombination belongs to.
